description.zh-cn: 一部由吴晗创作的京剧，因姚文元的批判文章而成为文化大革命的导火索。
description.en: A Beijing opera written by Wu Han, which became the trigger for the Cultural Revolution due to a critical article by Yao Wenyuan.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史学家、社会活动家，时任北京市副市长，《海瑞罢官》的作者。
description.en: A Chinese historian, social activist, then Deputy Mayor of Beijing, and the author of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都和直辖市。在文革前，其市委被毛泽东认为由彭真、刘少奇掌控。
description.en: The capital and a municipality of the People's Republic of China. Before the Cultural Revolution, its municipal committee was considered by Mao Zedong to be controlled by Peng Zhen and Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席，中华人民共和国的主要缔造者。他号召学习海瑞精神，并策划了对《海瑞罢官》的批判。
description.en: Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the main founder of the People's Republic of China. He called for learning from the spirit of Hai Rui and orchestrated the criticism of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position of the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982.

description.zh-cn: 明朝著名清官，以“直言敢谏”著称。
description.en: A famous upright official of the Ming Dynasty, known for his outspokenness and courage to admonish.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，海瑞是该时期的官员。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, during which Hai Rui was an official.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，发表《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》一文，揭开了文化大革命的序幕。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', who published the article 'On the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'', which marked the beginning of the Cultural Revolution.

nodes.id: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

zh-cn: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 由姚文元撰写、发表于《文汇报》的文章，对京剧《海瑞罢官》进行政治批判，被认为是文化大革命的导火索。
description.en: An article written by Yao Wenyuan and published in 'Wenhui Bao', which politically criticized the Beijing opera 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' and is considered the trigger of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场重大政治运动，由对《海瑞罢官》的批判揭开序幕。
description.en: A major political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China, which began with the criticism of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 1959年中国共产党中央委员会召开的会议，会上彭德怀因上书批评“大跃进”而遭到批判。
description.en: A meeting held by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in 1959, where Peng Dehuai was criticized for writing a letter criticizing the 'Great Leap Forward'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在1959年庐山会议上因批评左倾错误而被错误批判。对《海瑞罢官》的批判被认为影射了“彭德怀事件”。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who was wrongly criticized at the 1959 Lushan Conference for criticizing leftist errors. The criticism of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' was seen as an allusion to the 'Peng Dehuai incident'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1955年授予在中国人民解放军中作出卓越贡献的十位高级将领的最高军衔。
description.en: The highest military rank awarded by the People's Republic of China in 1955 to ten senior generals who made outstanding contributions to the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国国家重点京剧院团，邀请吴晗创作了京剧《海瑞罢官》。
description.en: A key national Beijing opera troupe in China, which invited Wu Han to create the Beijing opera 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 京剧表演艺术家，在京剧《海瑞罢官》中饰演主角海瑞。
description.en: A Beijing opera performing artist who played the leading role of Hai Rui in the opera 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 京剧表演艺术家，主演了京剧《海瑞罢官》。
description.en: A Beijing opera performing artist who starred in the opera 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 京剧表演艺术家，主演了京剧《海瑞罢官》。
description.en: A Beijing opera performing artist who starred in the opera 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 京剧琴师，在京剧《海瑞罢官》中担任琴师。
description.en: A Beijing opera musician who served as the accompanist for 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东主要著作的选集。
description.en: A collection of major works by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命前与毛泽东产生分歧，成为文革的主要目标之一。
description.en: Former Chairman of the People's Republic of China, who had disagreements with Mao Zedong before the Cultural Revolution and became one of its main targets.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共高级领导人，时任北京市委第一书记，被认为是刘少奇的支持者，是批判《海瑞罢官》事件的早期目标。
description.en: A senior leader of the CPC, then First Secretary of the Beijing Municipal Committee, considered a supporter of Liu Shaoqi, and an early target in the criticism of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的夫人，“四人帮”核心成员，在上海组织了对《海瑞罢官》的批判。
description.en: Mao Zedong's wife, a core member of the 'Gang of Four', who organized the criticism of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在上海市的领导机关，在柯庆施领导下，为江青组织批判《海瑞罢官》提供了支持。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shanghai. Under the leadership of Ke Qingshi, it provided support for Jiang Qing's organization of the criticism against 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共上海市委第一书记，安排张春桥、姚文元协助江青工作。
description.en: Then First Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, who arranged for Zhang Chunqiao and Yao Wenyuan to assist Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，在上海协助江青组织对《海瑞罢官》的批判。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four' who assisted Jiang Qing in Shanghai in organizing the criticism of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命后期中共中央的核心领导集团，由江青、张春桥、姚文元、王洪文组成。
description.en: The core leadership group of the CPC Central Committee in the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, consisting of Jiang Qing, Zhang Chunqiao, Yao Wenyuan, and Wang Hongwen.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市，批判《海瑞罢官》的文章在此地策划并首次发表。
description.en: A municipality of the People's Republic of China where the article criticizing 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' was planned and first published.

description.zh-cn: 上海市的综合性报纸，于1965年11月10日首次发表了姚文元的《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: A comprehensive newspaper in Shanghai that first published Yao Wenyuan's 'On the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'' on November 10, 1965.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报，转载了姚文元的文章，扩大了其影响力。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, which reprinted Yao Wenyuan's article, expanding its influence.

description.zh-cn: 京剧表演艺术家，因创作类似题材的戏曲《海瑞上疏》而在文革期间受到迫害。
description.en: A Beijing opera performing artist who was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution for creating a similarly themed opera, 'Hai Rui Submits a Memorial'.

description.zh-cn: 戏曲作家，与周信芳合编了《海瑞上疏》。
description.en: An opera writer who co-authored 'Hai Rui Submits a Memorial' with Zhou Xinfang.

description.zh-cn: 由周信芳、许思言合编的戏曲，与《海瑞罢官》题材相关。
description.en: An opera co-authored by Zhou Xinfang and Xu Siyan, with a theme related to 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 明朝内阁首辅，《海瑞罢官》剧情中海瑞不畏的权贵。
description.en: Grand Secretary of the Ming Dynasty, depicted in 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' as the powerful figure whom Hai Rui defied.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在1959年4月上海会议上提倡学习海瑞精神，促使吴晗创作了《海瑞罢官》。
description.en: Mao Zedong advocated learning from the spirit of Hai Rui at the Shanghai Conference in April 1959, which prompted Wu Han to create 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 吴晗于1959年4月开始构思并写作京剧《海瑞罢官》。
description.en: Wu Han began to conceive and write the Beijing opera 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' in April 1959.

relationships.source: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 姚文元发表的这篇文章被普遍认为是揭开文化大革命序幕的标志性事件。
description.en: This article published by Yao Wenyuan is widely regarded as the symbolic event that unveiled the prelude to the Cultural Revolution.

relationships.source: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 姚文元的文章斥责《海瑞罢官》是反党反社会主义的“毒草”，并指其影射了“彭德怀事件”。
description.en: Yao Wenyuan's article condemned 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' as an anti-Party and anti-socialist 'poisonous weed' and alleged that it alluded to the 'Peng Dehuai incident'.

relationships.source: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 作为《海瑞罢官》的作者，吴晗因该批判文章而受到攻击和政治迫害。
description.en: As the author of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office', Wu Han was attacked and politically persecuted due to this critical article.

description.zh-cn: 在1964年底的中央工作会议上，毛泽东与刘少奇的分歧公开化，毛泽东开始酝酿打击刘少奇的势力。
description.en: At the Central Work Conference at the end of 1964, the disagreement between Mao Zedong and Liu Shaoqi became public, and Mao began to plan to strike at Liu's power base.

description.zh-cn: 作为打击刘少奇势力的一环，毛泽东将由彭真掌控的北京市委作为突破口。
description.en: As part of the effort to strike at Liu Shaoqi's power base, Mao Zedong targeted the Beijing Municipal Committee, which was controlled by Peng Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 彭真是刘少奇的坚定支持者，两人共同掌控着被毛泽东视为“针插不进，水泼不进”的北京市委。
description.en: Peng Zhen was a staunch supporter of Liu Shaoqi, and together they controlled the Beijing Municipal Committee, which Mao Zedong described as 'impermeable'.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年7月的庐山会议上，彭德怀因上书批评当时的左倾错误而受到批判。
description.en: At the Lushan Conference in July 1959, Peng Dehuai was criticized for writing a letter criticizing the leftist errors of the time.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议后，吴晗也曾指责彭德怀为“假海瑞”。
description.en: After the Lushan Conference, Wu Han also accused Peng Dehuai of being a 'fake Hai Rui'.

description.zh-cn: 1960年，北京京剧团（北京京剧院前身）的马连良邀请吴晗创作京剧剧本《海瑞罢官》。
description.en: In 1960, Ma Lianliang of the Beijing Opera Troupe (predecessor of the Beijing Opera Theatre) invited Wu Han to write the script for the opera 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office'.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共上海市委第一书记柯庆施安排张春桥与姚文元协助江青在上海组织对《海瑞罢官》的批判。
description.en: Ke Qingshi, then First Secretary of the CPC Shanghai Municipal Committee, arranged for Zhang Chunqiao and Yao Wenyuan to assist Jiang Qing in organizing the criticism of 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office' in Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 在柯庆施的安排下，姚文元与张春桥一同协助江青在上海的工作，最终撰写了批判文章。
description.en: Under Ke Qingshi's arrangement, Yao Wenyuan, along with Zhang Chunqiao, assisted Jiang Qing's work in Shanghai, ultimately writing the critical article.

description.zh-cn: 在柯庆施的安排下，张春桥与姚文元一同协助江青在上海的工作。
description.en: Under Ke Qingshi's arrangement, Zhang Chunqiao, along with Yao Wenyuan, assisted Jiang Qing's work in Shanghai.

relationships.target: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 1965年11月10日，《文汇报》首次发表了姚文元的文章《评新编历史剧〈海瑞罢官〉》。
description.en: On November 10, 1965, 'Wenhui Bao' first published Yao Wenyuan's article 'On the New Historical Drama 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office''.

relationships.target: 评新编历史剧《海瑞罢官》

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》于1965年11月30日转载了姚文元的文章，使其在全国范围内产生影响。
description.en: The 'People's Daily' reprinted Yao Wenyuan's article on November 30, 1965, giving it nationwide influence.

description.zh-cn: 因创作了与《海瑞罢官》题材类似的戏曲《海瑞上疏》，周信芳在文化大革命期间受到迫害。
description.en: For creating the opera 'Hai Rui Submits a Memorial', which had a similar theme to 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office', Zhou Xinfang was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 京剧表演艺术家马连良主演了《海瑞罢官》，饰演主角海瑞。
description.en: The Beijing opera performing artist Ma Lianliang starred in 'Hai Rui Dismissed from Office', playing the main character Hai Rui.

description.zh-cn: 与许思言合编了戏曲《海瑞上疏》。
description.en: Co-authored the opera 'Hai Rui Submits a Memorial' with Xu Siyan.

description.zh-cn: 与周信芳合编了戏曲《海瑞上疏》。
description.en: Co-authored the opera 'Hai Rui Submits a Memorial' with Zhou Xinfang.
